text_Python_eng: In this level, we will explore the concept
of classes and methods that will help us
move an object around on a 2D grid
On the right you can see some code
that has been and will be written for
you in later levels. Don't worry about
trying to understand it just yet.
Just follow along and you might learn
something new! If it feels confusing,
that's perfectly fine, this code will be
already written for you in later levels.
We have created a class named Mob,
which represents an object on the grid.
This class includes the properties for
its position (x and y coordinates) and
methods to move the object in various
create a new Mob object. It sets the
starting position using the x and y
These methods allow us to change the
Mob's position after it is created.

text_Python_eng: In this level, you will learn about while
loops and how to use them in your code.
While loops are another type of loop in
Python. They allow us to repeat a block
of code as long as a specified
forever, as the condition is always true.
Your task is to move the Mob to the
finish, which is the trapdoor, but only
Do this by repeating that function with

text_Python_eng: From this level on, we will learn a little
bit about debugging, as it is a crucial
Debugging is the process of identifying
and fixing errors, or "bugs", in code
that prevent it from working as
Errors can be simple, like typos, or
more complex, such as logical errors
that cause unexpected behavior of the
Try to find a typo in the given code
